alert.note: Alert for Monroe (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued March 27 at 8:03AM EDT until further notice by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Peachtree City GA has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Georgia... Towaliga River at GA 83 near Juliette affecting Monroe County. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM THIS MORNING UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring. * WHERE...Towaliga River at GA 83 near Juliette. * WHEN...From this morning until further notice. * IMPACTS...At 16 feet, Minor flooding of woodlands in the natural flood plain begins along the river. Low lying areas of Byars Road...downstream and right bank from the gage on Monticello Highway or Georgia Highway 83 will begin to flood. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 7:45 AM EDT Monday the stage was 16.2 feet and rising. - Forecast...No forecast is available for this location. - Flood stage is 16 feet. &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at weather.gov/atlanta.
